content: this free pattern is for a basic knitted scarf in garter stitch it offers all the possibilities one could make based on yarn weight and needle sizes please note the embellishments seen at left in the photos are given in posts on my blog my blog will teach you tons of scarf variations for you to make it your own fringing embellishments and making a pocket version are all featured on my blog for free please visit there if you want to add any of these to your basic knitted scarf **use just about any yarn and add your own style to this simple scarf see my blog for how-2 s on everything from how-2 cast on how-2 knit how-2 bind off how-2 fringe etc
